From fun ringtone, notification & alarm sound to Kakao Talk & SMS notification sound and video ring/ alarm!!Pimp up your phone with fun sound and video that dodol pop provides. ââ How to use dodol pop Package âââ¶ If dodol pop is uninstalled, search for âdodol popâ in Google Play to install the latest version of  dodol pop. â¶Launch dodop pop and select âPackageâ menu, or touch the icon of downloaded package app and set video ringtone & SMS/ notification sound!â¶ Search for âdodol pop Packageâ on Google Play to experience more varied sound package. â¶ Please email us at support_dodolpop@campmobile.com for your inquiry/comment on creating new package.
